Use the RAGE 2011 UNLOCKED Version+CRACK+ CRASH FIX. It works 100%. Also update your gpu software (nvidia already has a beta, check out their website).
install notes:
1. Unpack in destinationfolder (for example) C: Program Files.
2. Unpack the Crack + Fix
3. Copy the content of RageDLL & Rage.Crack only.3DM to the destinationfolder (both maps are part of the Crack + Fix torrent). Overwrite the files if popup ask you. First copy the content of the map Ragde.Crack.only.3DM and then copy the content of the map RageDLL.
4. Now open the map Crash_Fix and use the installer. Select the destinationfolder you by step 1.
5. After install, update your gpu drivers.
6. The downloads don't contain virusses.
7. You can use your own account, no need to be administrator.
Good luck!

I couldn't get the skidrow one to work, but this one works like a charm. Just follow ShootingDutchman's instructions and additionally updated my amd driver  from here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6728210/RAGE.2011.Crack_CrashFix_ONLY

Oh, also to eliminate the texture popping and lag I made a rageConfig.cfg file and put it in the base folder. I got the cfg file info from somewhere else on this site, here it is:

seta image_usecompression "0"
seta image_anisotropy "16"
seta vt_pageimagesizeuniquediffuseonly2 "8192"
seta vt_pageimagesizeuniquediffuseonly "8192"
seta vt_pageimagesizeunique "8192"
seta vt_pageimagesizevmtr "8192"
seta vt_maxppf "24"
seta vt_maxlockedpages "256"
seta vt_minlod "-2"
seta vt_lodBias "-2"
seta vt_maxaniso "2"
seta vt_qualityhdplossless "1"
seta vt_qualityhdppower "0"
seta vt_qualityhdpspecular "0"
seta vt_qualityhdpnormal "0"
seta vt_qualityhdpdiffuse "0"
seta vt_qualitydctpower "100"
seta vt_qualitydctspecular "100"
seta vt_qualitydctnormal "100"
seta vt_qualitydctchroma "100"
seta vt_qualitydctluma "100"
seta vt_restart

it works great on my win7 64bit i5 laptop with 1 gb mobility radeon 545v and 8 gb ram (I don't get the most amazing texture quality but I can play with all settings maxed out and get no slowdown, and it still looks pretty good considering the machine).
